name: Adventures of Kaira
description:
This game was made for GameBoy jam 2015,

Gameboy jam is a yearly gamejam based around creating a game the looks like it could be a gameboy game.

In my particular case it might be sorta pushing the concept as it's a fully 3D game with a gameboy shader over it.

This game took about 8-9 days to create and may be filled with bugs everywhere. I hope you can enjoy it for what it is though!

And if you did enjoy it, make sure to rate it at

http://jams.gamejolt.io/gbjam4/games/adventures-of-kaira/86625
